original_title: Sri Lanka sells extra Rs3bn Treasury bills after auction
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has sold 3,096 million rupees of treasury bills offered on tap at average rates of 9.70% and 9.95%, the state debt office said.
On Wednesday (6) the debt office raised 175 billion rupees of 3, 6 and 12 month bills.
Sri Lanka sells Rs175bn in treasury bills, yields up for shorter maturities
